remarks: Membership in the set of continuous complex functions from ` A ` to ` B ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 26-Nov-2007.)
statement:
elcncf1i.1 $e |- F : A --> B $.
elcncf1i.2 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. RR+ ) -> Z e. RR+ ) $.
elcncf1i.3 $e |- ( ( ( x e. A /\ w e. A ) /\ y e. RR+ ) -> ( ( abs ` ( x - w ) ) < Z -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` x ) - ( F ` w ) ) ) < y ) ) $.
elcncf1ii $p |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B C_ CC ) -> F e. ( A -cn-> B ) ) $.
$d A w x y $.
$d B w x y $.
$d F w x y $.
$d Z w $.
